core.title: Massachusetts Town Corners
core.shortDescription: Locations of Massachusetts town boundary survey points linking to historical atlas inset maps; geography covers the state of Massachusetts; time period reflects the present
core.fullDescription: This dataset represents the locations of Massachusetts town boundary survey points. Each feature includes an image of a map from historical town boundary atlases. The geography covers the state of Massachusetts. The data reflects the current day, but links out to atlases created in the early 20th century. The Massachusetts Department of Transportation (MassDOT) created this dataset with attribute data pointing to atlases scanned by the State Library of Massachusetts (SLM). The LMEC has prepared this dataset for easier public use and created a webmap for discovery.
core.accessCondition: This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use.

ingredients.notes: MassDOT source data, which LMEC cleaned up for easier access and to point to corner image files

processing.steps:
1. Acquire source imagery from MassDOT 
 2. Host copies of the imagery 
 3. Clean up the original point file data, editing out some of the MassDOT-specific technical fields 
 4. Perform minor cleanup of image file names for consistency 
 5. Remove records which do not have associated historical imagery

publishedWorks.title: Get to Know Your Data: A Conversation with MassDOT
publishedWorks.author: Belle Lipton
